Keywords: Fantastic Four , Illuminati , Scientist
Real Name: Reed Richards
Special Powers
TORSO TRAMPOLINE: When a character's knockback path ends adjacent to Mr. Fantastic, after resolutions knock that character back a number of squares equal to the number of squares they were actually knocked back in any direction of your choosing.

I think you may need to reread ultimate nullifier, it doesn't work that way. Anyway for those that are a big fan of Shapechange w/ SS this guy is pretty good defensively. No move and attack, limited range and offensive powers. Not as good as the rare one from the set for the same points though.
